what: Function for variant annotation from vcf file — annotate_vcf_vep
title: Function for variant annotation from vcf file — annotate_vcf_vep
text: wrapper variant annotation VEP via bioconductor ensemblVEP

title: Function for variant annotation from vcf file — annotate_vcf_vep
code: annotate_vcf_vep(   path,   pval = 5e-08,   dir_cache =     "/cloud-data/its-cmo-darwin-magellan-workspaces-folders/WS_genetic_ts/PMCB_Genetics/data/VEP/110",   cache_version = 110,   nThread )

title: Function for variant annotation from vcf file — annotate_vcf_vep
text: path Specify full path starting /cloud-home/ vcf file, including file name. pval p value threshold filter. Default = 5e-8 dir_cache Specify cache directory use. Required. Default: "/cloud-data/-cmo-darwin-magellan-workspaces-folders/WS_genetic_ts/PMCB_Genetics/data/VEP/110" cache_version numeric. Use different cache version assumed default (VEP version). Required. Default: 110 nThread Number threads use parallel processes

title: Function for variant annotation from vcf file — annotate_vcf_vep
text: data.frame variant annotation. ensemblVEP return 82 columns VEP.

what: General function for ingesting GWAS summary statistics into GWAS-VCF format — format_sumstat2vcf
title: General function for ingesting GWAS summary statistics into GWAS-VCF format — format_sumstat2vcf
General function for ingesting GWAS summary statistics into GWAS-VCF format — format_sumstat2vcf
code: format_sumstat2vcf(   path,   SNP,   CHR,   BP,   A1,   A2,   FRQ,   BETA,   SE,   P,   NCAS,   N,   ref_genome,   id,   studytype,   save_path,   hg19_1kg_phase3,   trait,   group_name = NA,   year = NA,   author = NA,   consortium = NA,   sex = NA,   pmid = NA,   population = NA,   unit = NA,   subcategory = NA,   ontology = NA,   note = NA,   doi = NA,   sd = NA,   nThread,   ... )

title: General function for ingesting GWAS summary statistics into GWAS-VCF format — format_sumstat2vcf
text: path file name path summary statistics read .can compressed file *.tsv.gz SNP column name SNP (rs id). NULL, rs id inferred reference genome MungeSumstat CHR column name chromosome. Required. BP column name base pair positions. Required. A1 column name reference allele. NULL, inferred MungeSumstat. A2 column name alternative allele. Required.  note allele flipping check: MungeSumstats infers effect allele always A2 allele, approach done IEU GWAS VCF also adopted . FRQ column name alternate allele frequency SNP.column FRQ, set NULL, inferred 1kg reference BETA column name effect size estimate relative alternative allele. NULL, MungeSumstats sets impute_beta = TRUE SE column name standard error effect size estimate. NULL, MungeSumstats sets impute_se = TRUE P column name unadjusted p-value effect estimate. Required. NCAS column name number cases, studytype "Binary",Required.column NCAS, input integer number. studytype "Continuous", NA. N column name total sample size. Required. column sample size, input integer, MungeSumstats sets compute_n integer value N (sample size) every SNP dataset ref_genome name reference genome used GWAS ("GRCh37" "GRCh38") Argument case-insensitive. Required. id name vcf output file used gwas catalogue ID identifier studytype "Continuous" quantitative trait "Binary" binary trait. save_path path vcf written . End "/" hg19_1kg_phase3 FRQ NULL, annotate FRQ 1000 genomes phase 3 (hg19/GRCh37) allele frequencies index "/cloud-home/U1006974/GiTIPs/data/reference/.wgs.phase3_shapeit2_mvncall_integrated_v5c.20130502.sites.AF.tsv" trait trait name. Required. group_name group name. Optional. "public" "private" ... year Optional. author Optional. consortium Optional. sex Optional. pmid Optional. population Optional. unit Optional. subcategory Optional. ontology Optional. note Optional. doi Optional. sd Optional. nThread Number threads use parallel processes ... parameters MungeSumstats. See reference

title: General function for ingesting GWAS summary statistics into GWAS-VCF format — format_sumstat2vcf
text: one .vcf.gz file, one .vcf.gz.tbi file, one log file .log, one catalog file, .clg. Note: majority VCF handling bioinformatics libraries use .vcf.gz suffix, even block gziped output. However, VariantAnnotation::writeVcf() even index = TRUE support forceably sets suffix .bgz. See https://github.com/Bioconductor/VariantAnnotation/issues/35. current solution rename vcf.bgz vcf.gz

title: General function for ingesting GWAS summary statistics into GWAS-VCF format — format_sumstat2vcf

what: Function for Mendelian randomization using vcf file — mr_vcf
title: Function for Mendelian randomization using vcf file — mr_vcf
text: Extract instruments exposure vcf file pvalue threshold clumping extract outcome vcf file, format datasets TwosampleMR run Mendelian randomization using default methods, "mr_wald_ratio", "mr_egger_regression" "mr_ivw"

title: Function for Mendelian randomization using vcf file — mr_vcf
code: mr_vcf(   exposure_vcf,   outcome_vcf,   pval = 5e-08,   clump_r2 = 0.001,   clump_kb = 10000,   ldref,   plink_bin = genetics.binaRies::get_plink_binary(),   exclude_HLA = TRUE,   mr_method = subset(TwoSampleMR::mr_method_list(), use_by_default)$obj[c(1, 2, 4)],   nThread )

title: Function for Mendelian randomization using vcf file — mr_vcf
text: exposure_vcf Specify full path starting /cloud-home/ vcf file, including file name, exposure. Normally molecular qtl file outcome_vcf Specify full path starting /cloud-home/ vcf file, including file name, outcome. Normally gwas file pval p value threshold extract instruments exposure vcf file Default = 5e-8 clump_r2 Clumping r2 threshold. Default: 0.001 clump_kb Clumping kb window. Default: 10000. (strict) ldref LD reference data. Normally Europeans 1000 genomes reference panel. Default:"/cloud-home/U1006974/NeuroID/data/1kg/EUR" plink_bin Specify path plink binary. Default = "genetics.binaRies::get_plink_binary()" exclude_HLA Exclude SNPs HLA region . Default: TRUE. GRCh37; Location: chr6:28,477,797-33,448,354; mr_method methods use mr analysis. See [mr_method_list()] details. Default: subset(mr_method_list(), use_by_default)$obj[c(1,2,4)]. contain "mr_wald_ratio", "mr_egger_regression" "mr_ivw" nThread Number threads use parallel processes

title: Function for Mendelian randomization using vcf file — mr_vcf
Function for Mendelian randomization using vcf file — mr_vcf
Summary Statistics Column Headers — sumstatsColHeaders
text: List uncorrected column headers often found GWAS Summary Statistics column headers. Note effect allele always A2 allele, approach done VCF(https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC7805039/). (https://github.com/neurogenomics/MungeSumstats/blob/HEAD/R/data.R) enforced column header corrections also check allele flipping test.

what: Function for obtaining top hits from a GWAS vcf file with and without clumping — tophits_vcf
title: Function for obtaining top hits from a GWAS vcf file with and without clumping — tophits_vcf
text: Obtain top hits GWAS vcf file /without clumping Note: gwasglue::clump_gwasvcf function clumping using 1kg reference genome reference genome UKbiobank, issue top variant missing reference genome, "Removing top variants absence LD reference panel",  ideal. GWAS summary statistic imputed genome, sure cover SNPs unimputed reference genome. current solution get top SNP chromosome (unclumped_top), clumping using reference genome (clumped_df), (clumped_df) miss chromosome (unclumped_top), combine (clumped_df)

title: Function for obtaining top hits from a GWAS vcf file with and without clumping — tophits_vcf
code: tophits_vcf(   path,   clump_p = 5e-08,   clump_r2 = 0.001,   clump_kb = 10000,   ldref,   plink_bin = genetics.binaRies::get_plink_binary(),   nThread )

title: Function for obtaining top hits from a GWAS vcf file with and without clumping — tophits_vcf
text: path Specify full path starting /cloud-home/ vcf file, including file name. clump_p p value threshold filter. Default = 5e-8 clump_r2 Clumping r2 threshold. Default: 0.001 clump_kb Clumping kb window. Default: 10000. (strict) ldref LD reference data. Normally Europeans 1000 genomes reference panel. Default:"/cloud-home/U1006974/NeuroID/data/1kg/EUR" plink_bin specify path plink binary. Default = "genetics.binaRies::get_plink_binary()" nThread Number threads use parallel processes

text: data.frame top hits GWAS vcf file /without clumping
